dict.acceptation: 贵重的，宝贵的；有价值的；可评估的；

sent.orig: You have been very valuable to me. Very valuable.
sent.trans: 你对我老说非常有价值。非常的有价值。

sent.orig: Since this kind of feeling is very valuable, valuable things are so good to see it?
sent.trans: 因为这样的感情非常可贵，可贵的东西是那么好见到的吗？

sent.orig: This golden cage may be valuable to you; it is not valuable to the bird.
sent.trans: 这个金鸟笼，对你而言，也许有价值；对鸟而言，毫无价值。

sent.orig: The school has a valuable new acquisition (ie a valuable new teacher) in Mr Smith.
sent.trans: 学校里来了个生力军（很好的新教师）史密斯先生。

sent.orig: The question is:how valuable is, how valuable is that advise. advice?
sent.trans: 问题时，它的建议有多少价值？
